action.name: Multiattack
entries: The glavenus makes two bite attacks and one tail slash attack, or it uses its sharpen and then its tail spin.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) piercing damage + 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Tail Slash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Sharpen
entries: The glavenus sharpens its tail. The next two tail slashes deal an extra 13 ({@dice 2d12}) of fire damage.

Tail Spin (Recharge 5-6) The glavenus launches itself forward, using its tail to slash at all foes in a 15-foot radius around it. Each creature in that area must then make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) slashing damage and 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage on a failed save, and half as much on a successful one.
